short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for managing prompt templates and delivering them to AI services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using AI services like ChatGPT frequently requires an efficient way to manage prompts you use often.  
Promptly is designed to simplify this process and enhance productivity.

This extension works on the Chrome web browser and provides various features for creating and managing prompts.  
It is also designed to quickly deliver prompts to AI services like ChatGPT without repeated copy-and-paste actions.

This extension is completely free and does not collect any personal data.

ğŸš€ Release Note (v1.0.3, 2025-01-01)
1) Add prompts via text right-click menu
   - After selecting text on a webpage, you can add a desired prompt through the right-click menu.
2) Add titles to prompts
   - You can add titles to prompts for easier organization.
3) Prompt search
   - When selecting a prompt, you can now search to quickly find the one you need.
4) Webfont application
   - A webfont has been applied to ensure a consistent UI across different operating systems.
5) ChatGPT model change
   - Removed models that are no longer supported by ChatGPT.

âœ¨ Main Features
1) Manage prompt templates (CRUD)
   - Create new prompt templates
   - Modify, duplicate, and delete saved templates
   - Support for Import/Export
2) Sync saved prompts
   - Synchronize prompts across multiple devices with the same account
3) Automatic variable input UI
   - Automatically detects variables ({variable}) in prompt templates and generates a dynamic UI for user input
4) Combine prompts and copy to clipboard
   - Combine prompts using entered variables and copy them to the clipboard
5) Deliver prompts to AI services
   - Integrates with various AI services such as ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity
